title: NVIDIA announces Q1 FY2025 results: $26.0B revenue, data center at $22.6B
snippet: Record results with data center up 427% YoY; NVIDIA also announced a 10-for-1 stock split effective June 7 and raised its dividend.

title: Computer industry joins NVIDIA to build AI factories on Blackwell
snippet: At Computex, partners unveiled Blackwell-powered systems spanning cloud to edge to power the next wave of generative AI.

title: NVIDIA 10-for-1 stock split takes effect
snippet: NVIDIA executed a 10-for-1 split in June 2024, broadening retail accessibility after a sharp run-up tied to AI demand.
source: NVIDIA Investor Relations (noted within Q1 materials)

title: NVIDIA announces Q2 FY2025 results: $30.0B revenue, data center $26.3B
snippet: Another record quarter with continued hyperscale demand and sequential growth across the data center business.

title: Data center revenue growth continues: NVIDIA’s fiscal Q1 2025 earnings
snippet: Analysis recap: Q1 beat driven by data center outperformance vs. consensus; hyperscale and enterprise AI momentum remained the key driver.

title: Computex 2024: Blackwell systems showcased across partners
snippet: Broader context on NVIDIA’s roadmap and partner ecosystem at Computex as AI infrastructure scales globally.

title: Nvidia sparks chatter over possible Dow inclusion after stock split
snippet: Following its 10-for-1 split, analysts speculated about Nvidia's eligibility for the Dow given the lower post-split share price.
